```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(here)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(WGCNA)
library(ggrepel)
```


```{r import_data, include=T}
# Replace with python input after finalization
gene_data <- here("results/tximeta/gene_data.Rdata") %>% 
  readRDS(.)

abundance_matrix <- 
  assay(gene_data, 2) %>% 
  t()

```

```{r filter_data}
goodGenes <- goodSamplesGenes(datExpr = abundance_matrix, minNSamples = 2)

summary(goodGenes$goodGenes)
summary(goodGenes$goodSamples)

abundance_matrix_filtered <- abundance_matrix[,which(goodGenes$goodGenes)]
```


```{r PCA, echo=FALSE}
pca_data <- prcomp(x = t(abundance_matrix_filtered), center = T, scale. = T)
plot(pca_data)

pca_percent_variance <- 
  summary(pca_data) %$% 
  importance[2,] %>% 
  multiply_by(., 100) %>% 
  round(digits = 3) %>% 
  paste0("PC", 1:length(.), " (", ., "% variance)")

pca_data$rotation %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  rownames_to_column(var = "sample_ID") %>% 
  ggplot(
    data = ., 
    aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, label = sample_ID)
  ) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_text_repel() +
  ggtitle(label = "PCA of samples annotated by gene expression") +
  xlab(label = pca_percent_variance[1]) +
  ylab(label = pca_percent_variance[2])

pca_data$rotation %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  rownames_to_column(var = "sample_ID") %>% 
  ggplot(
    data = ., 
    aes(x = PC3, y = PC2, label = sample_ID)
  ) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_text_repel() +
  ggtitle(label = "PCA of samples annotated by gene expression") +
  xlab(label = pca_percent_variance[3]) +
  ylab(label = pca_percent_variance[2])


```

```{r hclust, echo=FALSE}
expr_hclust <- 
  str_extract(string = row.names(abundance_matrix_filtered), pattern = "[:digit:]{1,2}$") %>% 
  str_pad(string = ., 2, pad = "0") %>% 
  set_rownames(x = abundance_matrix_filtered, value = .) %>% 
  dist(x = ., method = 'euclidean') %>% 
  hclust(d = ., method = 'average')

plot(
  x = expr_hclust, 
  main = "Hierarchical clustering between samples",
  ylab = "Euclidean distance between samples",
  xlab = "Sample ID",
  hang = -1
)
```
